column2: Add support for specifying the debugging step size

column3: This patch adds the necessary plumbing to allow a language plugin to set the step size when debugging a jvm process.
This is useful, for example, for a bytecode-oriented language, where using a step size of StepRequest.STEP_MIN makes more sense than StepRequest.STEP_LINE
